сб, 21 июн. 2025 г. в 15:38, Dimas Pro <test.server.composer@gmail.com>:
>
> Hudsaodasoc
>
>
> On Sat, Jun 21, 2025 at 3:37 PM Алина Конончук <akononciuc@gmail.com> wrote:
>>
>> Hi, dear
>>
>> Best regards,
>> Cononciuc Alina

Dear COMPANY Team,
I hope this message finds you well.

My name is Maria, and I am reaching out on behalf of COMPANY CLIENT.
As our operations continue to grow, we are currently looking for a
reliable logistics partner to support our expanding supply chain
needs.

We are particularly interested in logistics solutions that can ensure
efficient and timely delivery of goods across Moldova, including both
domestic and international transportation, if available.

At this stage, we would appreciate it if you could provide us with
detailed information regarding:

- Delivery terms and timelines (local and international)
- Availability of warehousing and storage solutions
- Handling of various types of cargo (including fragile or perishable items)
- Pricing structure and potential cooperation models
- Additional services such as shipment tracking, documentation support, etc.

We would be grateful to receive your commercial proposal and are also
open to scheduling a call or meeting to discuss your services further.

Thank you for your time and attention. We look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Maria Iscariot

subject: Logistics request
body:
Dear COMPANY Team,
I hope this message finds you well.

My name is Maria, and I am reaching out on behalf of COMPANY CLIENT.
As our operations continue to grow, we are currently looking for a
reliable logistics partner to support our expanding supply chain
needs.

We are particularly interested in logistics solutions that can ensure
efficient and timely delivery of goods across Moldova, including both
domestic and international transportation, if available.

At this stage, we would appreciate it if you could provide us with
detailed information regarding:

- Delivery terms and timelines (local and international)
- Availability of warehousing and storage solutions
- Handling of various types of cargo (including fragile or perishable items)
- Pricing structure and potential cooperation models
- Additional services such as shipment tracking, documentation support, etc.

We would be grateful to receive your commercial proposal and are also
open to scheduling a call or meeting to discuss your services further.

Thank you for your time and attention. We look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Maria Iscariot

subject: Welcome message from Veltrix Foods
body:
Dear NordTrail Logistics Team,
I hope this message finds you well.

My name is Maria, and I am reaching out on behalf of Veltrix Foods.
As our operations continue to grow, we are currently looking for a
reliable logistics partner to support our expanding supply chain
needs.

We are particularly interested in logistics solutions that can ensure
efficient and timely delivery of goods across Moldova, including both
domestic and international transportation, if available.

At this stage, we would appreciate it if you could provide us with
detailed information regarding:

-Delivery terms and timelines (local and international)
-Availability of warehousing and storage solutions
-Handling of various types of cargo (including fragile or perishable items)
-Pricing structure and potential cooperation models
-Additional services such as shipment tracking, documentation support, etc.

We would be grateful to receive your commercial proposal and are also
open to scheduling a call or meeting to discuss your services further.

Thank you for your time and attention. We look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Maria Iscariot
Procurement Manager
Veltrix Foods

subject: Re: Welcome message from Veltrix Foods
body:
Dear Dimas Pro,

I think it's perfect!
Let's schedule the meeting on wednesday 25.06.2025 at 4 pm.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Maria Iscariot
Procurement Manager
Veltrix Foods

сб, 21 июн. 2025 г. в 18:22, Dimas Pro <test.server.composer@gmail.com>:
>
> Here's the response template:
>
> Dear Maria,
>
> Thank you for reaching out to NordTrail Logistics about collaborating as your logistics partner. We're excited to learn more about Veltrix Foods and explore how we can help support your expanding supply chain needs.
>
> To address your requests, we'd be happy to provide detailed information regarding our delivery terms and timelines, warehousing and storage solutions, handling of various types of cargo, pricing structure, potential cooperation models, and additional services such as shipment tracking, documentation support, etc.
>
> Here's some specific information about our services:
>
> - Delivery terms and timelines: We offer door-to-door delivery services, both local and international, with reliable timelines and tracking options.
> - Warehousing and storage solutions: Our state-of-the-art warehouse facilities in Moldova offer secure storage spaces for various types of cargo, with climate control and handling equipment for fragile or perishable items.
> - Handling of various types of cargo: Our experienced team is trained to handle a wide range of cargo types, including fragile or perishable items, using specialized equipment and procedures.
> - Pricing structure and potential cooperation models: We offer competitive pricing and flexible cooperation models tailored to the needs of each client. Please let us know if you'd like to discuss more about this.
> - Additional services: Our comprehensive logistics services include shipment tracking, documentation support, and customs clearance.
>
> We'd be delighted to send you a commercial proposal and schedule a call or meeting to discuss our services in more detail. Would you be available this week or next for a call?
>
> Thank you for your attention to this opportunity. We look forward to discussing how we can collaborate to meet the logistics needs of Veltrix Foods.
>
> Best regards,
> Dimas Pro
>
>
> On Sat, Jun 21, 2025 at 6:15 PM Алина Конончук <akononciuc@gmail.com> wrote:
>>
>> Dear NordTrail Logistics Team,

>> reliable logistics partner to support our expanding supply chain

>>

>> domestic and international transportation, if available.
>>
>> At this stage, we would appreciate it if you could provide us with
>> detailed information regarding:
>>

>> -Availability of warehousing and storage solutions
>> -Handling of various types of cargo (including fragile or perishable items)
>> -Pricing structure and potential cooperation models
>> -Additional services such as shipment tracking, documentation support, etc.
>>
>> We would be grateful to receive your commercial proposal and are also

subject: Angry
body:
Good day, dears.

Are you seriously kidding me right now? This is the third fucking time
I’ve had to deal with this bullsht and I’ve absolutely had enough. How
the hell do you screw up something this basic over and over again?
It's like no one gives a single damn over there.

I've wasted hours trying to fix your goddamn mess, and not a single
fucking apology or explanation. Do you even test your shit before
shipping it out? Honestly, what kind of incompetent assholes are
running this thing?

You better fix this crap ASAP or I swear to God I’m pulling the plug
and never coming back. I don’t have time for this nonsense and I’m not
your beta tester. Get your shit together.

Best regards,
Maria (Angry) Iscariot
